entry.title: The Undo-Redo
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,260Chapters: 2/8Kudos: 24

Summary: Nightwing is hit by a spell that has takes about a decade off his age. This whole situation would be a footnote in a report if that were the only problem, but about a decade ago he didn’t know Jason, Tim or Damian. Dick had left the vigilant life behind so he wasn’t in contact with Bruce or anyone from their teams and communities. Oh and Bruce is off world with Clark and Diana so there is no help from that corner.His other little problem doesn’t appear in any aspect of this life he now lives and he is left to ask what happened?

entry.title: And That We Call Being
entry.summary:
Author: oldrockformations

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,111Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 389

Summary: “I’m Sorry?” If Tim's… friend (would Tim get shot if he were to call Jason his brother?) is feeling particularly gregarious, they might chat about light subjects—the latest trafficking ring Jason's brought down, the newest security measures government agencies have implemented to try and keep Tim out, whatever shenanigans their assorted siblings and sibling-adjacent friends are getting into. But they've always avoided any conversation topics that might be considered heavier. Namely: feelings. It's been a perfectly normal Tuesday morning so far. They haven't exchanged any words today, other than a dry greeting when Tim sat down half-an-hour ago. There's no way they're about to have this conversation right here, right now. "Do you ever think about being a woman?"   Or Jason comes to terms with the idea that he might be a woman, and realizes how loved she is in the process Or Orjesus christ can u imagine the sociopolitical impacts of the red hood coming out as trans

entry.title: Restful Morning
entry.summary:
Author: SinsTatum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,464Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 106

Summary: The first thing that Tim became aware of as his eyes slowly opened out of a deep sleep was that he was pleasantly warm. His face pressed softly into the silk sheets of his bed and his mouth cracked open somewhere between a gasp and a yawn. "You're awake," a voice hums over his shoulder and a shift in the sheets draws his eyes from the sheets to twist over his shoulder to catch sight of the man settled behind him. Bruce looked beautiful. The early morning light slipping through their cracked curtains and his bare chest exposed to Tim letting his eyes trace down the firm muscles from his throat to his chest. He sucks in a slow breath eyes blinking and face falling back into the sheets as he feels the man shift behind him again. "Fuck—" he lets out a choked off sound his body tensing up and a heat rolling through his chest at the sudden realization about what actually woke him up.

entry.title: Rainbow Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Flowerparrish

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,154Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 42

Summary: There's so many things Tim didn't know before, but it makes sense that men can like men, and women can like women, and that there's even people who don't want to be called men or women at all. Tim doesn't think he's met anyone like this at his parents' parties, or the galas he sometimes attends, and he doesn't know anyone at school well enough to know what other kids might say about any of this. That's fine though; Tim's great at researching things thoroughly and forming his own opinions, and his opinion is that this is super cool.The more he thinks about it, the more he wonders if any of these words applies to him. He's doesn't have any idea about attraction, but his research indicates that he might be too young for that to be easy to figure out. Gender, though, maybe that's something?

entry.title: Little Sparrow
entry.summary:
Author: ihrt

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,024Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 231

Summary: "Maybe it was better that Tim’s parents were never around, if this is the course of his life. If mother and father weren’t there, they couldn’t see the swell of his belly. If they weren’t here, they wouldn’t see him running to the kitchen sink to empty the casserole from his stomach. He knew when it happened, it only needed to be once and despite how he preferred to dress. How he’d forged his parent's signatures and changed his legal name, it still happened. He’d filled the trash can with tests to check, but only after ignoring it for nearly four months." Tim was gonna not mention it to anyone, was going to find another spot once it was too big to hide, and find a hospital to have his child on his own. His parents, his school mates, and no one would ever know. And then the Wayne's aka the bats got involved.

entry.title: o superman, o judge
entry.summary:
Author: slipstream

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,308Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 48

Summary: “Has Robin always been this, uh…” There’s a pause that grows heavier the longer it lingers. “Stoic?” “I dunno,” Kon sighs. “Maybe? I only ever teamed up with him like, twice before the whole ‘Kidworld’ thing, but that was before Superman came back, so there’s a pretty big gap in between.” “I could be wrong, but…” Bart sounds uncharacteristically hesitant, like each word is being slowly pulled out of him. “I think something might have happened to him. Something bad.”(Five rooftop encounters between the third Robin and a Kryptonian, and one that happens deep underground.)
